gmeet.ask.select_meeting_type: Select type of meeting you want to start
gmeet.ask.title: Google Meeting Start
gmeet.command.help.text:
* |/gmeet| - Create a new meeting
* |/gmeet start [topic]| - Create a new meeting with specified topic
* |/gmeet help| - Show this help text
* |/gmeet settings see| - View your current user settings for the Google Meet plugin
* |/gmeet settings [setting] [value]| - Update your user settings (see below for options)

###### Google Meet Settings:
* |/gmeet settings naming_scheme [words/uuid/mattermost/ask]|: Select how meeting names are generated with one of these options:
    * |words|: Random English words
    * |uuid|: UUID (universally unique identifier)
    * |mattermost|: Mattermost specific names. Combination of team name, channel name and random text in public and private channels; personal meeting name in direct and group messages channels.
    * |ask|: The plugin asks you to select the name every time you start a meeting
gmeet.command.help.title: ###### Mattermost Google Meet Plugin - Slash Command help
